title: Enemy Observation
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Wait! Is that you, Nico!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Geh, well, isn’t it Yoshiko. What are you doing here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s Yohane! And that’s my line! Oh, you must be here to do reconnaissance on QU4RTZ, huh~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I-, it’s not like that! Nico is just here to watch my cute disciples’ event.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku! It’s the same for me. I’m sure they’d love to have this Yohane to watch the event live!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>.... I’m not giving up the front row center seat.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Yeah, that’s fine. Because Yohane will be next to you! The fallen angel Yohane does not mind giving her spot to her cute little demon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Haaah!? Whooooooo are you calling your little demon!? Hold on, I can’t let that slide! In the first place, you-....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah, wait, it’s starting! Be quiet!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>We’ll definitely talk about this more after the event, okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
